# ChangeLog

## v4.6.0
* Typescript support for locale-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3639

## v4.5.0
* Switched location service calls to context based API, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3582

## v4.4.2
* Added logging of USER_LOCALE, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3268

## v4.4.1
* CAPTCHA-372 #comment accept-language only for GBH countries

## v4.4.0
* Enable accept-language for non-service cases

## v4.3.0
* Changing Ungrouping SiteIds logic for Subdomain enabled applications

## v4.2.1
* Support unrecognized US users on international site supporting SEO, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/SEO-9880

## v4.0.8
* Support Sub-Domain for GBH/GEO for supporting SEO, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1707

## v4.0.7
* Fixed: TerritoryID is sent incorrect for non-GEO countries when user from DE access ebay.co.uk, territory should be DE but instead going as GB.
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1700

## v4.0.6
* Added new `@ebay/location-service-ebay` `v3` service and updated tests

## v4.0.5
* Service: added accept-language control for locality.locale

## v4.0.4
* Updated parsing logic for _ul for backwards compatibility to handle '-' and '_'.

## v4.0.3
* Fixed: fails with NPE when `_ul` is used more then once in the query, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1661

## v4.0.2
* locale-ebay: allow the use or `_ul` for external world, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1614

## v4.0.1
* locale-ebay to provide option to change context resolver plan and commons-ebay to refresh user location values, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1536

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.2.14
* Fixed: should not call LBS service for requests that have an internal IP address

## v0.2.13
* Fixed GEO team use-cases related to geo config.

## v0.2.12
* Enhancement: Added `Content-Language` header to the Response Headers.

## v0.2.11
* Fixed: should support service context, i.e. should avoid reading from cookies when in service context
